channel.title: Help me please
channel.description:
These people keep nocliping
i was wondering if there is any way i can make it to when they use noclip it autobans them?

item.title: Help me please
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip") && playerRights <= 1) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " is a n00b who wants to cheat!"); showInterface(99999999); // Xerozcheez: Haha take that noob appendToBanned(playerName); disconnected = true; } else { sendMessage("Trying to cheat noob"); sendMessage("Trying to cheat noob"); sendMessage("Trying to cheat noob"); sendMessage("Trying to cheat noob"); sendMessage("Trying to cheat noob"); sendMessage("Trying to cheat noob"); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " Ban me now!!!! any admins by order of Owner :0"); MainHelpMenu(); } }

There. I also made it so that only admins and owner can noclip. If you don’t want admins to noclip, just change

playerRights <= 1

to

playerRights <= 2

Read full topic

item.title: Help me please
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

This is what it looks like can you show me what i needs to look like

[code]else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“noclip”) && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“kkk”))
{

if (absY <= 3000)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " is a n00b who wants to cheat!");
showInterface(99999999); // Xerozcheez: Haha take that noob
disconnected = true;
}
else
{
sendMessage(“Trying to cheat noob”);
sendMessage(“Trying to cheat noob”);
sendMessage(“Trying to cheat noob”);
sendMessage(“Trying to cheat noob”);
sendMessage(“Trying to cheat noob”);
sendMessage(“Trying to cheat noob”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " Ban me now!!! any admins by order of Owner :0");
MainHelpMenu();
}
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Help me please
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

Search for the command

"noclip"

Search for that, with the quotations. Once you find it, add this in it

appendToBanned(playerName);

Read full topic
